comments.author: gsuntop@getpocket.com
comments.text: We'll need a way to set the value of `cta` for spocs coming from Adzerk on an individual basis if we don't already have that capability.
comments.raw_text: We'll need a way to set the value of `cta` for spocs coming from Adzerk on an individual basis if we don't already have that capability.
comments.creator: gsuntop@getpocket.com

comments.raw_text: We already have that capability. There's a "CTA" field in AdZerk that gets passed through as `cta`.
comments.creator: mathijs@getpocket.com
comments.author: mathijs@getpocket.com
comments.text: We already have that capability. There's a "CTA" field in AdZerk that gets passed through as `cta`.
